name: intimidate

effect.sun-moon: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Does not take effect if acquired after entering battle.

short_effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon intimidates opposing Pokémon upon entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
